+ <template>
+   <div class="star-rating-custom" :class="{ 'star-rating-small': size === 'small' }">
+     <div 
+       v-for="star in 5" 
+       :key="star"
+       class="star-item"
+       :class="getStarType(star)"
+     >
+       <!-- ç©ºå¿ƒæ˜Ÿæ˜ŸèƒŒæ™¯ -->
+       <div class="star-empty"></div>
+       <!-- å®å¿ƒæ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿå¡«å…… -->
+       <div class="star-filled" :style="getStarFillStyle(star)"></div>
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ interface Props {
+   rating: number
+   size?: 'normal' | 'small'
+ }
+ 
+ const props = withDefaults(defineProps<Props>(), {
+   rating: 0,
+   size: 'normal'
+ })
+ 
+ // è®¡ç®—æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿç±»å‹
+ const getStarType = (starNumber: number): string => {
+   const rating = props.rating
+   if (starNumber <= Math.floor(rating)) {
+     return 'star-full'
+   } else if (starNumber - 0.5 <= rating) {
+     return 'star-half'
+   }
+   return 'star-empty-type'
+ }
+ 
+ // è®¡ç®—æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿå¡«å……æ ·å¼
+ const getStarFillStyle = (starNumber: number): object => {
+   const rating = props.rating
+   
+   if (starNumber <= Math.floor(rating)) {
+     // å®Œæ•´å¡«å……
+     return { width: '100%' }
+   } else if (starNumber - 0.5 <= rating) {
+     // åŠæ˜Ÿå¡«å……
+     return { width: '50%' }
+   }
+   // æ— å¡«å……
+   return { width: '0%' }
+ }
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .star-rating-custom {
+   display: inline-flex;
+   align-items: center;
+   gap: 1px;
+ }

+ .star-item {
+   position: relative;

+   height: 16px;

+ }

+ }

+ /* å®å¿ƒæ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿå¡«å…… */
+ .star-filled {
+   position: absolute;
+   top: 0;
+   left: 0;
+   height: 100%;
+   overflow: hidden;
+   clip-path: polygon(
+     50% 0%, 
+     61% 35%,
